com.yaphet.chapa.client

Interface ChapaClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChapaClientImpl

    public interface ChapaClient

    A client to interact with Chapa API.


    Implement this interface to create your own client or use the default implementation ChapaClientImpl.
